name: Plant a seed of faith
description:
A human mind, a consciousness, a living being that can feel. In life, Negative things can sprout a seed of doubt in the mind, but positive things can grow a seed of faith. Protect this mind by moving walls at the right spots. In life, removing and blocking out negativity leaves more room for positivity to grow. Survive as long as you possibly can and plant a seed of faith.

Controls

Move - Arrow keys

Pickup/Select - X (Must touch the walls)

Drop - Z

Credits

I made the whole things from making assets in Photoshop, programming in Unity and  making the  music in GBStudio

Other mentions

-This game was made for the GBJam 10 gamejam  and I made it in less than a week

-This game can only be played on computer and is not mobile friendly

-How did you guys like it? - Jonathan
